channel.title: More people on Server?!?
channel.description:
Well I have a server that a lot of people like... But i have one problem... When i get about 12 people on my server I get this Java Heap Space Message or something in the Compiler... And then no more people can join... So i restart the server only to get the people who werent able to get on before complaining about not being able to get on and stuff... How can i be able to get more people on my server instead of it only being 12? I also heard of something called like worlds or something? Can someone explain that to me aswell?
Please help me... I want to make my server really good and this is just holding me back... I have seen some servers that have like 30 to 40 people online... How is that?!?!??

item.title: More people on Server?!?
item.dc:creator: @geraldo_love geraldo love
item.description:
@geraldo_love wrote:

It didn’t work… I still get Java Heap Space at 12 players… :mad:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2008, 07:20:10 am[/size][hr]anyone else know anything?

Read full topic

item.title: More people on Server?!?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:5, topic:222329”]Wow, don’t mind their stupidity geraldo. You need to use the -Xmx switch, so in your runserver, if you had: java server

You’d replace it with:

java -Xmx512m server

That tells Java it CAN use 512mb of RAM, and now you won’t get java heap space. ;)[/quote]
Wow thats real nice buddy. Just because I didn’t know how to do that I am know mentally retarded? Thanks dude.

Read full topic

item.title: More people on Server?!?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Wow, don’t mind their stupidity geraldo. You need to use the -Xmx switch, so in your runserver, if you had: java server

You’d replace it with:

java -Xmx512m server

That tells Java it CAN use 512mb of RAM, and now you won’t get java heap space.

Read full topic

it was already set to 200
anyone else have an idea??

item.title: More people on Server?!?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Search this in your PlayerHandler.Java file public static final int maxPlayers = 200; Set 200 to whatever you want. I’m not sure if thats right but you can try it.

Read full topic

item.title: More people on Server?!?
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

You have a max player setting on that server, i dont know how to change it but that seems the problem. Hopfully that i now just posted this people can help you.
